name: Headz Go Racing
description:
Pick from your favourite Headz and master your driving style in this stylized cartoon casual racing sim/game.

Try RACE mode against AI cars on stylized racing circuits with very tight corners and limited space or TIME TRIAL without the AI cars for more speed and earning more upgrade points, or go Time Trial rallying on the open world rally map based in Finland, please dont take the F1 cars rallying, they really dont like it.. Race against your GHOST car and try and beat your best times.

Whichever you choose its all about putting in the miles and winning races so you can unlock lots of tracks, cars and car livery to apply.


Pick from a selection of great cars, earn upgrade points by putting in the miles and then add the upgrades to further improve your car and bring down them lap times.

The cars are semi realistic physics based cars, which can be upgraded as you progress.

Select different weather conditions to race in which will affect the handling of your car.

Please Note: This is a early version of the game and alot of features are yet to be added, if your looking for a fully fleshed out game experience then I would suggest you wishlist the game and come back later when it has been further developed.
